capability.name: Prospect Campaign Design
capability.definition: Design and refine prospect campaign specifications based on their impact
capability.role: This Service Domain designs and refines prospect campaigns (or integrates designs from external campaign specialists). Prospect campaigns target new customer acquisition and are typically proactive (involving prospect targeting, contact and solicitation). Version numbering is used to track the impact of changes made to campaigns over their usage.
capability.example: A prospect acquisition campaign is updated to provide amended/improved pricing terms that can be offered to targeted prospects poor take-up rate has been detected for the campaign

key_features.name: Define the target profile/impact of a campaign
key_features.description: Enables define the target profile/impact of a campaign to support design and refine prospect campaign specifications based on their impact

key_features.name: Specify a prospect campaign
key_features.description: Enables specify a prospect campaign to support design and refine prospect campaign specifications based on their impact

key_features.name: Track the impact of a campaign
key_features.description: Enables track the impact of a campaign to support design and refine prospect campaign specifications based on their impact

key_features.name: Refine/reconfigure a campaign
key_features.description: Enables refine/reconfigure a campaign to support design and refine prospect campaign specifications based on their impact
